pageContent: Objective: Psychosexual morbidity is common after prostate cancer treatment, however, long-term prospective research is limited. We report 5-year outcomes from a couples-based intervention in dyads with men treated for localised prostate cancer with surgery.

metaData.source:
Prostate cancer patients and their partners: differences in satisfaction indices and psychological variables
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/17634055/
